data.message:
I see too many people asking how to create the year in review.   Good luck.  Do the best you can for what it has to offer.  It won't be near as good as the example Facebook just did of their year in review.   
The following link is:
http://facebook.com/lookback

replies.message: Thanks for your feedback, David. We're constantly working to make our products better. We'll take this back to our team, and if you have any more suggestions, let us know here: http://on.fb.me/1bc3BDo -Hailey
